section.heading: Frequently Asked
section.description: Get answers to common queries about our services and operations

faqs.question: What is Salsabeel Al Janoob?
faqs.answer: Salsabeel Al Janoob is a service provider with operations in the Sultanate of Oman and India, offering import-export services along with a range of other solutions like waste management, civil contracts, and consultancy services.

faqs.question: Where are your operations based?
faqs.answer: Our Sultanate of Oman operations are based in Salalah and Barka, while our India operations are headquartered in Coimbatore, Tamilnadu.

faqs.question: What services do you provide?
faqs.answer: We offer services such as export & import, specialized chemical waste management, civil contracts, retail consultancy, educational and career guidance, and much more. Visit our Services section for detailed information.

faqs.question: Can you manage specialized chemical waste?
faqs.answer: Yes, we specialize in chemical waste management, ensuring environmentally compliant solutions.

faqs.question: Do you offer retail consultancy?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide consultancy for setting up and managing 24x7 convenience stores, cake shops, fast food stalls, restaurants, supermarkets, and more.

faqs.question: What kind of civil contracts do you handle?
faqs.answer: We handle design to construction, demolition of old buildings, landscaping, fencing, boulder laying, painting, electric works, solar panel connections, and all types of annual maintenance contracts.

faqs.question: Do you provide educational and career guidance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we guide students with career counseling, foreign language learning, and provide vasthu and family counseling services.

faqs.question: How can I contact your team?
faqs.answer: You can reach us via email at info@salsabeelaljanoobimpexp.com or through phone/WhatsApp. Visit our Contact section for more details.
